featured.text: The 1962 celebration "was more enthusiastic -- a lot more people," said one spectator, who as a young newlywed attended Glenn’s first parade and came from her Brooklyn home again for Glenn’s second parade.
Another spectator said that too many Americans take the achievements of the space program for granted.

definition.en_def: A person who watches an event, show, game, or activity.
definition.example: The spectators cheered loudly as the team scored a goal.
